scripts.dev: cd server && npm install && npm run start
scripts.cutg: cd server && npm install --save -g dotenv && npm install nodemon -g
scripts.launch: cd server && npm install express && npm start
scripts.Start: npm run cutg && npm run launch
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dist: cd client && cd dist && npm run serve
scripts.Build: npm run client && npm run locate
